cities.name: Tokyo
cities.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Japan's capital city, where traditional culture meets modern innovation.

cities.name: Kyoto
cities.description: Discover ancient temples, traditional gardens, and geisha culture in Japan's cultural heartland.

cities.name: Rome
cities.description: Walk through history in the Eternal City, home to ancient ruins, Renaissance art, and delicious cuisine.

cities.name: Venice
cities.description: Explore the romantic canals and stunning architecture of this unique floating city.

cities.name: New York
cities.description: The city that never sleeps offers iconic landmarks, world-class museums, and diverse neighborhoods.

cities.name: Los Angeles
cities.description: Home to Hollywood, beautiful beaches, and perfect weather, LA offers entertainment and culture.

temples.name: Angkor Wat
temples.description: The largest religious monument in the world, this temple complex is a masterpiece of Khmer architecture.

temples.name: Taj Mahal
temples.description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum and one of the most iconic symbols of love and architectural beauty.

temples.name: Borobudur
temples.description: The world's largest Buddhist temple, featuring nine stacked platforms and over 500 Buddha statues.

beaches.name: Whitehaven Beach
beaches.description: Famous for its white silica sand and crystal-clear turquoise waters in the Whitsunday Islands.

beaches.name: Anse Source d'Argent
beaches.description: One of the most photographed beaches in the world with stunning granite boulders and clear waters.

beaches.name: Navagio Beach
beaches.description: Also known as Shipwreck Beach, this isolated cove features a rusting shipwreck on white sand surrounded by towering cliffs.
